description: Main application component (App) for the recipe frontend, managing routing, state, and rendering different pages such as recipe list and details.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component managing app routing, state, and rendering child components.

methods.name: navigate
methods.description: Updates the URL hash and route state to navigate between views.

methods.name: onBack
methods.description: Handler for Tizen back key; navigates back to home from recipe detail view.

methods.name: selectedId
methods.description: Memoized value extracting the recipe ID from route hash.

methods.name: onCardClick
methods.description: Handler to navigate to recipe detail page when a recipe card is clicked.
